DOC.brief_summary: The objective study evaluate safety efficacy 26 week treatment calcitriol 3 mcg/g ointment use twice daily , without occlusion , treat pediatric subject ( 2 16 year 11 month age ) mild moderate plaque psoriasis .
DOC.brief_title: Long Term Safety Efficacy Study Calcitriol 3 mcg/g Ointment Pediatric Subjects With Plaque Psoriasis
DOC.criteria: Male female 2 16 year 11 month age Clinical diagnosis stable mild moderate plaque psoriasis Other form psoriasis Hypercalcemia Past history kidney stone Vitamin D deficiency Other concomitant dermatological disease
